name: Rat Simulator
description: A survival stealth role-playing simulator where you play as a rat in a suburban neighborhood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX / AMD Radeon HD 5870 or equivalent videocard Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
